topic.title: why
topic.body: leftism ? why so much of it here ?

1565678144_1GUhkGiS4PmRreV33ddFfEMqfdgjJ.body: their brains are small, they are vulgar, dirty, violent, they steal and also don't work and still expect to get money.

4chan going down. i don't think so.
